Metadata: Coastal erosion management in Australia and the U.S
"Coastal and Ocean Management 'Coastal Zone 1985'," Proceedings of the Fourth Symposium, pp. 91-106, Baltimore, Maryland, July 30-August 1, 1985.

Using case studies from the U.S. and Australia, three facets of coastal zone management are examined: (1) common law rules of shoreline ownership and boundary change; (2) potential public and private tort liabilities incurred in connection with shoreline construction and management activities; and (3) management, planning, and regulatory responses to coastal
